name: Super Chest Arena
description:
This game is for the Social Game Jam from tiltspot.

This is a platformer battle arena games where your main goal is to collect as many chest as you can. Each chest contains different weapon and ability. Killing doesn't give you point, but it help you survive the game. Survive and collect as many chest as you can.

The game is using tiltspot plugin and a mobile phone as the controller. This game can be play from 1 to 6 people as a couch multiplayer games. To test the game, you need to download the extra file controller and asset. And also follow this link https://dev.tiltspot.tv/getting_started/game_tester and download the gametester.zip and follow each step.

PS:

This game is still in development, there will be more features, power up, weapon and enemies. There might still be some bug. If you find them, please tell us or email us at anoainteractive@gmail.com
